info.name: Rhodophobia Tab Center
info.description: Styled Firefox Tab Center for my Rhodophobia skin
info.additionalInfo: Styles the Tab Centre from the Firefox Test Pilot Addon (https://testpilot.firefox.com) like my Rhodophobia skin (https://userstyles.org/styles/130573/rhodophobia). In a separate stylesheet to add /* AGENT_SHEET */, as otherwise Tab Center styles cannot be overridden.
